meanings.definition: A habitational surname from places in England called Curzon, derived from the Old English personal name *Curra + dūn ‘hill’.
meanings.english_definition: A habitational surname from places in England called Curzon, derived from the Old English personal name *Curra + dūn ‘hill’.

etymology.value: From places in England called Curzon, derived from the Old English personal name *Curra + dūn ‘hill’.
